title: 208 - Find Your Focus, Motivation Secrets & Time Management
description:
This episode covers a grab bag of topics with lots of tactics, fresh ideas and new perspectives designed to get you jazzed about making stuff today!

I hope most of these topics will hit you in the sweet spot, but I bet one or two of these will be exactly what you need to hear today.

Some topics we cover in this episode:

  • How to find your focus
  • Why you need to rethink time management
  • Making BIG CHANGES in your work
  • How to unlock a deep well of motivation you didn't know you had!
  • AND MORE!

This episode is Ask Dr. Pizza episode where I answer questions submitted via Instagram Stories @andyjpizza

NEW 2019 Creative Pep Talk Calendar
creativepeptalk.etsy.com

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com

Dr. Pizza Theme by Ben Worley
http://benworley.work/
